text: rajav parannu: ninnal yusuphine enre atutt keant varu. annane tanre atutt dutan vannappeal addeham (yusuphâ€Œ) parannu: ni ninre yajamananre atuttekk tiriccupeayitt svantam kaikal murippetuttiya a strikalute nilapatentanenn addehatteat ceadicc neakkuka. tirccayayum enre raksitav avarute tantrattepparri nannayi ariyunnavanakunnu
